mc.server.comm

Class CommAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • mc.server.comm.CommAPI

  • public final class CommAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    Communication API Abstraction Library Class.

    All communication related methods are part of this static class and are implemented originally by com.mashape.unirest.http.Unirest. Creating an object of this class is not allowed and should be used only as a static class methods.

    Apart from communication API, it also contains methods to support communication like CommAPI#stringURLEncode, CommAPI#stringURLDecode and CommAPI#getEC2DNSList

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Malhar Chaudhari

    • Method Detail

      • sendGetRequest

        public static java.lang.String sendGetRequest(java.lang.String protocol,
                                              java.lang.String dns,
                                              java.lang.String mapping,
                                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> queryStringMap)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Sends GET request to the node being defined by the input parameters
        Parameters:
        protocol - Application level protocol being used to send the request
        dns - DNS of the node to which request is being sent
        mapping - Mapping to the servlet on the node server to which request is being sent
        queryStringMap - Query key:value map for the servlet on the node to which request is being sent
        Returns:
        Returns body of the response to the request, if no exception encountered
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if connection cannot be established

      • stringURLEncode

        public static java.lang.String stringURLEncode(java.lang.String input)
                                        throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        URL encodes a string before sending it over the network to avoid transmission errors and failures
        Parameters:
        input - Input string to be encoded
        Returns:
        Returns URL encoded string
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if string cannot be encoded in UTF-8 format

      • stringURLDecode

        public static java.lang.String stringURLDecode(java.lang.String input)
                                        throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Decodes a URL encoded string received by this node
        Parameters:
        input - URL encoded string
        Returns:
        Returns the original string before being URL encoded
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if string cannot be decoded in UTF-8 format

      • getEC2DNSList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEC2DNSList(java.lang.String type,
                                                             java.lang.String sep)
        Reads the EC2 DNS List populated by the deployment script
        Parameters:
        type - Possible inputs are master or worker for reading the master or the worker node DNSs respectively
        sep - The separator between the DNSs in the DNS List file
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of string containing the DNS, if no IOException is thrown

      • setReqTimeout

        public static void setReqTimeout(long connTimeout,
                                 long socketTimeout)
        Sets the connection and socket timeout for the GET requests
        Parameters:
        connTimeout - The timeout until a connection with the server is established (in milliseconds). Default is 10000. Set to zero to disable the timeout.
        socketTimeout - The timeout to receive data (in milliseconds). Default is 60000. Set to zero to disable the timeout.

      • setDefaultHeaders

        public static void setDefaultHeaders(java.lang.String Header,
                                     java.lang.String Value)
        Set default header for the GET request
        Parameters:
        Header - The header input as a string
        Value - The value for the corresponding header as a string

      • setReqConcurrency

        public static void setReqConcurrency(int maxTotal,
                                     int maxPerRoute)
        Set the concurrency levels for the GET request
        Parameters:
        maxTotal - Defines the overall connection limit for a connection pool. Default is 200.
        maxPerRoute - Defines a connection limit per one HTTP route (this can be considered a per target host limit). Default is 20.
